TEXT.English: Make Ayutthaya the most populous city in the world in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1700年时使大城（Ayutthaya）成为世界上人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Population in cities on the Lower Nile: %d1 / %d2
Have a capital with developing culture by 900 AD, a different capital with refined culture by 1100 AD and another capital with influential culture by 1400 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元900年时首都文化为正在发展，公元1100年时另一座首都文化为精致优雅，公元1400年第三座首都文化为影响深远

TEXT.English: Secure or get by trade 7 spices resources by 1775 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1775年之前占据或通过交易获得7处香料资源

TEXT.English: Strongest army of any nation with holdings in Africa: %s1
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有非洲领土的国家中最强大的军队：%s1
清真言：将伊斯兰教传播到全球40%的城市

TEXT.English: Control 2 holy city shrines in 350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年（498回合）时控制2座宗教圣殿
已控制欧洲大陆领土比例：%s1 / %s2%%

TEXT.English: Found a city in America by 1100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1100年之前于美洲建立1座城市

TEXT.English: Pleased or friendly relations with independent European civilisations: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 与独立的欧洲文明建立热情或亲密的关系：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Build three Islamic Grand Mosques by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前建造3座伊斯兰大清真寺
三桅战舰和皇家海军主力战舰数：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Allow no European colonies in North and Central America and in the Caribbean and control or vassalize Mexico in 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保在公元1900年时的北美洲、中美洲和加勒比地区没有欧洲殖民地；同时占领墨西哥地区，或纳为附庸

TEXT.English: Have the highest total culture and research output in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年时拥有全球最高的文化和科研产出

TEXT.English: Have more than 15000 Culture in 170 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元170年（462回合）时至少拥有15000点文化值

TEXT.English: Make Cairo the most populous city in the world and have at least 30 population on the Lower Nile in 1380 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1380年时，确保开罗成为世界上人口最多的城市，同时尼罗河下游城市人口之和达到30以上

TEXT.English: Have three Catholic vassals in Europe by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前在欧洲拥有三个天主教附庸国

TEXT.English: Ensure there are no European colonies in Subequatorial Africa in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元1700年时在赤道以南非洲地区没有欧洲殖民地
公元350年（253回合）前控制7座世界级奇观
关系亲密的共产主义文明：%d1/%d2

TEXT.English: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 50 turns by 1970 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1970年前拥有全球最高的支持率累计达到50回合

TEXT.English: Control three cities in the Maghreb and conquer two cities in Iberia and West Africa in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年时控制至少三座马格里布地区城市，并征服伊比利亚地区和西非各两座城市

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年（121回合）之前在迦太基城（Carthage）建成宫殿及巨港（世界奇观）

TEXT.English: Control 2 holy city shrines in 350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年（253回合）时控制2座宗教圣殿

TEXT.English: Gift 10 Digger, Marines or Mechanized Infantry to at least three different civilizations by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前，赠送10个澳新军团、海军陆战队或机械化步兵给至少三个不同的文明
控制全球25%及以上的人口
控制一个欧洲文明的核心区

TEXT.English: Settle a total of ten great artists and statesmen in Vienna and have at least pleased relations with eight independent European civilisations by 1850 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1850年前，在维也纳定居总计10位大艺术家和大政治家，并与8个独立的欧洲文明外交关系至少达到热情的
公元1400年前将佛教传播到全球25%的城市

TEXT.English: Convert to Orthodoxy eight turns after its foundation and have three settled Great Prophets and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在东正教创立后8个回合内皈依东正教，并在公元1200年前让三位大预言家在埃塞俄比亚城市定居，同时拥有一座东正教大教堂

TEXT.English: Control or get by trade 7 fur resources by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年前控制或通过贸易获得7处毛皮资源

TEXT.English: First to enter the Industrial Era
Colonies in Brazil, Africa and Asia: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 巴西、非洲和亚洲的殖民地：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Connect your capital to an Atlantic and a Pacific port by railroad by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1920年前，通过铁路连接首都和大西洋、太平洋港口城市（要求铁路全程在本文明文化范围内）

TEXT.English: Road along the Andean Coast in your territory
Make Constantinople the world's largest and most cultured city in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年时使君士坦丁堡成为世界上人口最多、文化值最高的城市

TEXT.English: Build the Pyramids, the Great Library, and the Great Lighthouse by 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（408回合）前完成建造大金字塔，大图书馆和大灯塔

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年（188回合）前在迦太基城（Carthage）建成宫殿及巨港（世界奇观）

TEXT.English: Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前250年（193回合）前建成帕特农神庙、青铜巨像、宙斯神像以及阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: No European colonies in South America (except Brazil)
TEXT.Chinese: 除巴西外的南美洲没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Convert to Orthodoxy fifteen turns after its foundation and have three settled Great Prophets and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在东正教创立后15个回合内皈依东正教，并在公元1200年前让3位大预言家在埃塞俄比亚城市定居，同时拥有一座东正教大教堂

TEXT.English: Control all of Indochina in 1580 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1580年时控制整个中南半岛

TEXT.English: Chosen People: Have a total of 15 Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in your cities
TEXT.Chinese: 上帝选民：共计15名大预言家、大科学家及大政治家在本国城市定居

TEXT.English: Control three cities in the Balkans, Northern Africa and the Near East in 1450 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1450年时控制巴尔干地区、北非以及近东地区各三座城市

TEXT.English: Control 20% of the world's population in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年时控制全球至少20%的人口

TEXT.English: Experience six golden ages by 2000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元2000年前经历6次黄金时代

TEXT.English: Acquire 4500 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前通过劫掠、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得4500金币
世俗主义文明定居的大科学家：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Ensure there are more Orthodox than Muslim cities in Africa in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保在公元1500年时非洲东正教城市比伊斯兰教城市更多

TEXT.English: Conduct a trade mission to your holy city by 1350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1350年前在官方宗教圣城进行一次贸易活动

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年（368回合）前在迦太基城（Carthage）建成宫殿及巨港（世界奇观）

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover Architecture, Politics, Scholarship, Machinery and Civil Service
TEXT.Chinese: 率先研发建筑、政治学、奖学金制度、机械和文官制度

TEXT.English: Make contact with a European civilization before any European civilization discovers America
TEXT.Chinese: 在任何欧洲文明发现美洲之前与欧洲文明建立联系

TEXT.English: Have 7500 gold in 1500 AD and 15000 gold in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年时拥有7500金币，并在公元1700年时拥有15000金币

TEXT.English: Have more than 50000 culture in 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年时至少拥有50000点文化值
公元1301年时控制欧洲至少20%的领土

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 涅槃：拥有全球最高的支持率累计达到100回合

TEXT.English: Controlled unimproved Forest and Marsh tiles: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 控制的未开发的森林和沼泽地块：%d1 / %d2
定居在新教国家城市的大商人：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前250年（124回合）前建成帕特农神庙、青铜巨像、宙斯神像以及阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: Have an average city culture of 18000 by 1600 AD without ever losing a city
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1600年前，在从未失去过任何城市的前提下，城市平均文化值达到18000点

TEXT.English: First to discover technologies in the %s1 era: %d2 / %d3
Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前250年（124回合）前建成帕特农神庙、青铜巨像、宙斯神像以及阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: Acquire 15% of the votes in the Apostolic Palace by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前在教皇宫投票中获得至少15%的选票

TEXT.English: Diaspora: Have friendly relations with six civilizations with a Jewish minority
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太侨民：与至少6个国内具有犹太教城市的文明建立亲密外交关系

TEXT.English: Hajj: Settle seven great people in the Muslim holy city
TEXT.Chinese: 朝觐：在伊斯兰教圣城定居7位伟人

TEXT.English: Make your capital the city with the highest trade income in the world
TEXT.Chinese: 确保本国首都成为全球商路收入最高的城市

TEXT.English: Acquire 12 trading company resources by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前获得12处贸易公司资源

TEXT.English: Build Notre Dame, Versailles, the Louvre, the Eiffel Tower and the Metropolitain by 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1900年前建成圣母院、凡尔赛宫、卢浮宫、埃菲尔铁塔和大都会地铁

TEXT.English: Have a city of at least 20000 culture in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年时拥有一座超过20000点文化值的城市
公元350年前控制7座世界奇观

TEXT.English: Have more than 7500 Culture in 170 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元170年（235回合）时至少拥有7500点文化值

TEXT.English: Secure a total of 10 silver and gold resources by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前控制共计10处白银和黄金资源

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize all cities and 90% of the territory in Canada without ever conquering a city by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在不征服任何城市的情况下，公元1950年前占据或附庸加拿大区域内所有城市以及90%的领土

TEXT.English: Build the Pyramids, the Great Library, and the Great Lighthouse by 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（208回合）前完成建造大金字塔，大图书馆和大灯塔
控制中美洲领土百分比：%s1 / %s2%%

TEXT.English: Conduct one Diplomatic Mission with the owner of an Egyptian city and 3 Trade Missions in your state religion's Holy City by 1259
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1259年前，与一个在埃及地区拥有城市的文明开展1次外交任务（类似大政治家前往对方城市提升外交关系），并在本国官方宗教的圣城进行3次贸易任务（类似大商业家前往对方城市换取金币）

TEXT.English: Have the largest army of Africa in 1600 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1600年时拥有非洲规模最大的军队

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前850年（133回合）时确保巴比伦成为全球人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Number of melee and gunpowder units: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 近战和火器单位的数量：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Acquire 9000 gold through piracy by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前通过海上掠夺获得9000金币

TEXT.English: Build 6 Castras, 5 Aqueducts, 4 Arenas and 3 Forums by 100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元100年(228回合)前建成6座罗马兵营、5座引水渠、4座竞技场和3座中心广场

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, Phoenicia, Babylonia and Persia in 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年时控制埃及、腓尼基、巴比伦和波斯

TEXT.English: Control the largest army of any nation with holdings in Africa and control Libya, Nigeria, and Cameroon by 1603
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1603年前拥有所有在非洲有城市的国家中规模最大的军队，同时控制利比亚、尼日利亚和喀麦隆

TEXT.English: Never lose a single city until 1950 AD and Allow no foreign powers in Southern Asia in 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前不失去任何一座城市，同时确保公元1950年时南亚无非南亚文明殖民地。

TEXT.English: Build 6 step pyramids and sacrificial altars by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前建成6座阶梯金字塔和6座人牲祭坛

TEXT.English: Have 100 turns of cities celebrating "We Love the King" day
TEXT.Chinese: 本国城市累计经历100回合“我们热爱国王日”

TEXT.English: Build San Marco Basilica, the Sistine Chapel and Santa Maria del Fiore by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前建成圣马可大教堂、西斯廷教堂和花之圣母大教堂

TEXT.English: Build four Buddhist Sanghas and Hindu Ashrams and Wat Preah Pisnulok and control them in 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年时建成4座佛院，4座印度教静修院以及吴哥窟并控制它们

TEXT.English: Have a city of at least 60000 culture in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年时拥有一座超过60000点文化值的城市

TEXT.English: Continuous empire from the Danube River to Lake Zaysan
TEXT.Chinese: 从多瑙河到斋桑湖的连续领土帝国

TEXT.English: Build three Christian Cathedrals by 1600 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1600年之前建造三座基督教大教堂（含天主教、新教及东正教）

TEXT.English: Control the core of another European civilization in 1050 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元1050年时控制一个其他欧洲文明的核心区域

TEXT.English: You have failed goal %d1 of your historical victory!
Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 公元320年（162回合）时控制真实历史中属于罗马帝国的所有区域

TEXT.English: Control 9% of the world's population in 1940 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1940年时控制世界人口的9%
利用艺术工匠产生200点文化值

TEXT.English: Have a total population of 30 by 800 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前800年前总人口达到30

TEXT.English: Control 12% of the world by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前控制世界12%的陆地

TEXT.English: Have the highest food, production and commerce output in 1850 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1850年时拥有全球最高的食物、产能和商业产出
公元1450年前拥有12000点文化值

TEXT.English: Acquire 4500 gold by selling resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前通过交易资源获得4500金币

TEXT.English: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 慈：拥有全球最高的民众预期寿命累计达到300回合

TEXT.English: Acquire 4500 gold through piracy by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前通过海上掠夺获得4500金币

TEXT.English: Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（134回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚

TEXT.English: Turns of "We Love the King" days: %d1 / %d2
Sila: Be at peace for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 戒律：保持和平状态至少300回合

TEXT.English: Be the first to adopt Tolerance and have Friendly Relations with 5 Catholic Civs in 1867 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 全球率先实行宗教宽容政体，并在公元1867年时，与5个天主教文明外交关系达到亲密的

TEXT.English: Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 公元320年时控制真实历史中属于罗马帝国的所有区域

TEXT.English: Spread Catholicism to 30% of the world population and allow no Protestant civilizations in Europe in 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年时，确保天主教人口占世界总人口的至少30%，同时欧洲不存在新教文明

TEXT.English: Be the first civilization to complete the Manhattan Project and a Lunar Landing
TEXT.Chinese: 成为第一个完成曼哈顿计划和登月计划的文明

TEXT.English: Ritual: Have five wonders in the Confucian holy city
TEXT.Chinese: 礼：儒学圣城中拥有至少5座世界奇观

TEXT.English: Conduct a Diplomatic mission in a European City controlled by a Muslim Civilization by 1031 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1031年前在一个由穆斯林文明控制的欧洲城市执行一次外交任务

TEXT.English: City in China connected to a Mediterranean port
TEXT.Chinese: 连接一座中国城市与一处地中海港口
公元350年（164回合）前控制7座世界奇观

TEXT.English: Have 4500 gold and 3000 culture in 800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元800年时拥有4500金币并积累3000点文化值

TEXT.English: Religious Freedom: Make sure at least half of all civilizations are Protestant or secular
TEXT.Chinese: 信仰自由：确保全世界至少一半的文明国教为新教或实行世俗主义政体

TEXT.English: Have more than 750 culture in 550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元550年时积累至少750点文化值

TEXT.English: Acquire 9000 gold by selling resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前通过交易资源获得9000金币

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world in 700 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前700年时（148回合）使巴比伦成为世界上文化值最高的城市

TEXT.English: Be the first to complete all Industrial technologies and eight Global technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 率先完成所有工业时代科技及8项全球化时代科技

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前850年时使巴比伦成为世界上人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Have three cities with influential culture by 1600 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1600年前拥有3座文化等级为影响深远的城市

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world in 700 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前700年时使巴比伦成为世界上文化值最高的城市

TEXT.English: Allow no European Colonies in Southern Africa by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1920年前确保非洲南部没有欧洲国家殖民地

TEXT.English: Acquire 6000 gold by selling resources by 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年前通过交易资源获得6000金币

TEXT.English: Allow no foreign powers in Southern Asia in 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元1900年时南亚没有非南亚文明的殖民地

TEXT.English: Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 公元320年时（250回合）控制真实历史中属于罗马帝国的所有区域

TEXT.English: No European colonies in South Africa
TEXT.Chinese: 非洲南部没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Control the shrines of Hinduism and Buddhism in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（208回合）时控制印度教和佛教的圣殿

TEXT.English: Secure or get by trade 5 gems resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前，占据或通过交易获得5处宝石资源

TEXT.English: Have more than 500 culture in 550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元550年时积累至少500点文化值

TEXT.English: Have 10 Religious Happiness and a larger Jewish population than any other nation in 1031 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1031年时，拥有至少10个宗教带来的笑脸，并且拥有比其他任何国家更多的犹太教人口
四大牧首区：建成4座东正教大教堂

TEXT.English: Railroad from Cape Town to an Egyptian Mediterranean port
TEXT.Chinese: 开普敦到埃及地中海港口的铁路

TEXT.English: Make Mexico City the largest city in the world in 1960 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元1960时墨西哥城是全球人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Acquire 4000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions) by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年前通过贸易(商路、外交、贸易任务)获得4000金币

TEXT.English: Don't allow more than half of your cities to have a religion
TEXT.Chinese: 确保你的文明一半以上的城市没有任何宗教

TEXT.English: Have more than 5000 Culture in 170 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元170年（152回合）时至少拥有5000点文化值

TEXT.English: Create three great generals by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前产生3位大将军

TEXT.English: South America, Central America and the Caribbean: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 南美洲、中美洲及加勒比地区：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Allow no foreign cities in South America in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元1700年时南美洲无非南美文明殖民地

TEXT.English: Great artists and statesmen settled in %s1: %d2 / %d3
TEXT.Chinese: 入驻%s1的大艺术家和大政治家：%d2 / %d3

TEXT.English: Control Northern Africa, Hejaz, the Levant and Mesopotamia by 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1300年前控制北非、汉志、黎凡特和美索不达米亚

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, Phoenicia, Babylonia and Persia in 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年时控制埃及、腓尼基、巴比伦和波斯

TEXT.English: No European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元1500年时在东非以及赤道以南非洲没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Build 3 Confucian Guozijians and 3 Taoist Gongs and 2 Buddhist Chaityas by 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年前建成3座学宫、3座道宫及2座佛寺。

TEXT.English: Create an overland trade route from any city in China to one of your Mediterranean ports and spread the Silk Route to 10 of your cities by 1100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1100年前创建一条从任意一座中国区域内城市连接一座地中海港口的商路，并将丝绸之路（贸易公司）传播到至少10座城市

TEXT.English: Acquire 4000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions, dhows) by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前，通过贸易（商路、外交、贸易使团、独桅帆船）获得4000金币

TEXT.English: Experience a golden age by 550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元550年前经历一次黄金时代

TEXT.English: Holy Land: Control the Catholic shrine and make sure that at least 12 great prophets are settled in Catholic civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: 圣地：控制天主教圣城，并确保天主教文明城市中入驻至少12位大预言家

TEXT.English: Build five Tambos and a road along the Andean Coast by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前建成5座土堡驿站，并建成一条沿着安第斯海岸的道路

TEXT.English: No European colonies in North and Central America and the Caribbean
TEXT.Chinese: 北美洲、中美洲和加勒比地区没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Be first to create three different types of great person
TEXT.Chinese: 成为全球第一个诞生3种不同类型伟人的文明

TEXT.English: Never more than half of all cities with a religion
TEXT.Chinese: 确保全世界一半以上的城市没有任何宗教

TEXT.English: Acquire 10 different happiness resources by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前获得10种不同的奢侈资源

TEXT.English: Build the Temple of Kukulkan by 900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元900年前建成库库尔坎神庙

TEXT.English: No foreign cities in South America
TEXT.Chinese: 南美洲没有非南美文明城市
从外交交易中获得4000金币

TEXT.English: Control the Eastern Mediterranean, the Black Sea, Cairo, Mecca, Baghdad and Vienna by 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年前控制地中海东部、黑海、开罗、麦加、巴格达和维也纳
获得的黄金和白银资源：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Harmony: Have friendly relations with five civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: 和：与至少5个文明关系达到亲密的

TEXT.English: Acquire 6000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions, dhows) by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前，通过贸易（商路、外交、贸易使团、独桅帆船）获得6000金币

TEXT.English: Build the Parthenon, the Colossus, the Statue of Zeus and the Temple of Artemis by 250 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前250年（378回合）前建成帕特农神庙、青铜巨像、宙斯神像以及阿尔忒弥斯神庙

TEXT.English: Have 9000 gold and 6000 culture in 800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元800年时拥有9000金币并积累6000点文化值
世界前五城市中的印度教城市：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Have 20% of the world population in 1850 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1850年时至少占世界人口的20%
公元1200年时积累12000点文化值
公元1980年前制造一棵洲际弹道导弹
圭亚那地区不存在殖民地

TEXT.English: Build the Statue of Liberty, the Brooklyn Bridge, the Empire State Building, the Golden Gate Bridge, the Pentagon and the United Nations by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前建成自由女神像、布鲁克林大桥、帝国大厦、金门大桥、五角大楼以及联合国
友好关系的天主教文明：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前850年时（84回合）使巴比伦成为世界上人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Artha: Experience 24 turns of golden age
TEXT.Chinese: 富足：经历24回合黄金时代

TEXT.English: Have open borders with another civilization by 1600 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前1600年前与其他文明开放边界

TEXT.English: Build Wembley, Cristo Redentor and the Itaipu Dam
TEXT.Chinese: 建成温布利球场、救世基督像和伊泰普水坝

TEXT.English: Sila: Be at peace for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 戒律：保持和平状态至少100回合

TEXT.English: Have 3000 gold and 2000 culture in 800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元800年时拥有3000金币并积累2000点文化值

TEXT.English: Colonize every continent by 1860 AD and build the Cape to Cairo Railway by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1860年前殖民全球各大洲，同时公元1920年前建成开普敦到开罗的铁路（要求铁路全程在本文明文化范围内）
目标完成了！（%s1 - 第%d2回合）

TEXT.English: Build an Islamic Grand Mosque by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前建成一座伊斯兰大清真寺

TEXT.English: Gain 1000 gold through slave trade by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年前通过奴隶贸易获得1000金币

TEXT.English: Modernity: Make sure that the five most advanced independent civilizations are secular
TEXT.Chinese: 现代化: 确保世界上科技最先进的5个独立文明均为世俗主义文明

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover eight Global and eight Digital technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 率先研发8项全球化时代科技以及8项数字化时代科技

TEXT.English: Conduct two trade or diplomatic missions with the most prominent (top scoring) European civilization by 1327 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1327年前，对积分最高的欧洲文明执行两次贸易或外交任务

TEXT.English: Acquire 12000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions) by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年前通过贸易(商路、外交、贸易任务)获得12000金币

TEXT.English: Found 7 colonies in Siberia by 1700 AD and build the Trans-Siberian Railway by 1920 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年前在西伯利亚建立7个殖民地，同时公元1920年前建成横贯西伯利亚的铁路（要求铁路全程在本文明文化范围内）

TEXT.English: Settle Hawaii, New Zealand, Marquesas and Easter Island by 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年前在夏威夷、新西兰、马克萨斯群岛和复活节岛建立城市

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world in 700 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前700年时（94回合）使巴比伦成为世界上文化值最高的城市

TEXT.English: Pleased or friendly relations with Christian civilisations: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 保持热情或亲密外交关系的基督教文明数量: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize the Deccan and Srivijaya in 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年时控制或附庸德干地区和室利佛逝地区

TEXT.English: Build the Pyramids, the Great Library, and the Great Lighthouse by 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（134回合）前完成建造大金字塔，大图书馆和大灯塔

TEXT.English: Acquire 8 different happiness resources by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前获得8种不同的奢侈资源
盟国商业产出占全球总产出百分比：%s1 / %s2%

TEXT.English: Gain 3000 gold through slave trade by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年前通过奴隶贸易获得3000金币
天主教文明控制的领土：%s1 / %s2%
控制加拿大区域内所有城市

TEXT.English: Spread Islam to 30% of the cities in the world
TEXT.Chinese: 确保伊斯兰教传播到全世界至少30%的城市

TEXT.English: Communion: Make sure there are no Catholic civilizations in the world
TEXT.Chinese: 圣餐仪式: 确保世界上没有天主教文明

TEXT.English: Holy See: Be Pope for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 圣座：成为教皇累计100回合
入驻东正教城市的大预言家数量：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Be first to discover Compass, Paper, Gunpowder and Printing
TEXT.Chinese: 率先研发罗盘、造纸、火药及印刷术

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, Phoenicia, Babylonia and Persia in 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年时控制埃及、腓尼基、巴比伦和波斯

TEXT.English: Have open borders agreement with 14 other civs by 1550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前与14个文明开放边界

TEXT.English: Enlightenment: Be first to discover Civil Liberties, Social Contract and Economics
TEXT.Chinese: 启蒙之光：率先研发公民自由、社会契约及经济学

TEXT.English: Control a Hit Movie and spread Oil Industry to a city by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前控制1处热门电影资源并将石油公司传播到1座城市

TEXT.English: Kama: Make sure the five largest cities in the world are Hindu
TEXT.Chinese: 爱经：确保世界上人口最多的5座城市均为印度教城市

TEXT.English: Acquire four pearl resources and control 50 ocean tiles
TEXT.Chinese: 获得4处珍珠资源并控制50块海洋地块

TEXT.English: No European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa in 1910 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保公元1910年时在东非以及赤道以南非洲没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Highest commerces output in Islamic civs: %s1
TEXT.Chinese: 商业产出最高的伊斯兰文明：%s1

TEXT.English: As a communist civilisation, have friendly relations with five other communist civilisations by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 作为一个共产主义文明，公元1950年前与其他5个共产主义文明建立亲密的外交关系
永远不失去任何一座城市

TEXT.English: Have more than 500 Culture in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前850年时(84回合)拥有超过500点文化值

TEXT.English: Have 7 great people in Berlin in 1900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1900年时在柏林入驻7位伟人

TEXT.English: Holy Mission: Make sure at least 50% of the world is controlled by Catholic civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: 圣命：确保全世界至少50%的领土由天主教文明控制

TEXT.English: Build the Moai Statues by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年前建成摩埃石像群

TEXT.English: Build the St. Sophia Cathedral and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1327 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1327年前建成基辅圣索菲亚大教堂以及1座东正教大教堂

TEXT.English: Control 6% of the world and pillage 20 improvements by 900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元900年前控制全球6%的领土，并掠夺20个设施
公元1450年前积累8000点文化值

TEXT.English: Control 20 Forest Preserves and have a National Park in your capital by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前控制20座森林保护区，并且在首都拥有1座国家公园

TEXT.English: Control the city with the highest research for 10 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 控制全球科研产出最高的城市累计10回合

TEXT.English: Have open borders with 6 European civilizations in 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年时与6个欧洲文明开放边界
公元200年时（238回合）积累7500金币

TEXT.English: Have four non-obsolete wonders in your capital in 1550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1550年时在首都拥有4个未过时的奇观

TEXT.English: Middle Way: Have cautious or better relations with all civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: 中道：与所有文明外交关系均达到谨慎的或以上

TEXT.English: Settle two of the following island groups by 800 AD: Hawaii, New Zealand, Marquesas and Easter Island
TEXT.Chinese: 公元800年前在夏威夷、新西兰、马克萨斯群岛和复活节岛中的任意2个区域建立城市
通往太平洋港口的铁路

TEXT.English: Control 2 Orthodox Cathedrals and have Pleased or better relations with 5 other Christian Civilizations in 1365
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1365年时控制2座东正教大教堂，并与5个基督教文明建立热情或更好的外交关系

TEXT.English: Experience five golden ages by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年前经历5个黄金时代

TEXT.English: Work Ethic: Make sure five great merchants and five great engineers are settled in Protestant civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: 工匠精神：确保至少5位大商人以及5位大工程师入驻新教文明城市

TEXT.English: Shahnameh: Have legendary culture in the Zoroastrian holy city
TEXT.Chinese: 列王纪：确保祆教圣城文化等级达到辉煌永恒

TEXT.English: Control 7% of the world by 140 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元140年前控制全球7%的陆地

TEXT.English: Control the Baltic Coast, the Kattegat and the Skagerak by 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年前控制波罗的海沿岸、卡特加特海峡以及斯卡格拉克海峡
公元1745年前征服4处欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 涅槃：拥有全球最高的支持率累计达到300回合

TEXT.English: Have more gold in your treasury than the rest of the world combined
TEXT.Chinese: 确保拥有金币数量大于世界其他文明金币数量之和
世界上人口最多的文明：%s1

TEXT.English: Control ten wonders that require no state religion
TEXT.Chinese: 控制10座非国教世界奇观

TEXT.English: Have 11250 gold in 1500 AD and 22500 gold in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年时拥有11250金币，并在公元1700年时拥有22500金币

TEXT.English: Acquire 12000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions, dhows) by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前，通过贸易（商路、外交、贸易使团、独桅帆船）获得12000金币

TEXT.English: Have legendary culture in Paris in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保巴黎在公元1700年时文化等级达到辉煌永恒

TEXT.English: Experience two golden ages by 1930 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1930年前经历2次黄金时代

TEXT.English: Settle three great spies in your capital
Be the first to found a colony in America
TEXT.Chinese: 率先在美洲建立殖民地

TEXT.English: Civilization with the largest Catholic population:
TEXT.Chinese: 全世界天主教人口最多的文明：

TEXT.English: Control in 320 AD all the area historically known as the Roman Empire
TEXT.Chinese: 公元320年时（492回合）控制真实历史中属于罗马帝国的所有区域

TEXT.English: Have five Great Priests, Great Scientists, or Great Artists and one of each settled in your cities in 1211 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1211年前在本国城市中入驻总计5名大预言家、大科学家及大艺术家（每种至少1名）

TEXT.English: Acquire 6000 gold by trade (trade routes, diplomacy, trade missions) by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年前通过贸易(商路、外交、贸易任务)获得6000金币

TEXT.English: Enter the Industrial Era before anyone enters the Global Era
TEXT.Chinese: 在任何其他文明进入全球化时代之前进入工业时代

TEXT.English: Be first to discover Civil Liberties
Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（208回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚

TEXT.English: Have open borders with 10 civilizations by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前与10个文明开放边界

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover Mathematics, Literature, Aesthetics, Philosophy and Medicine
TEXT.Chinese: 率先研发数学、文献、美学、哲学和传统医学

TEXT.English: Have more culture than all European civilizations combined in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年时，拥有文化值大于欧洲所有文明的总和
世界五大城市均为东正教城市：d1/%d2

TEXT.English: Build a Palace and the Great Cothon in Carthage by 300 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前300年前在迦太基城（Carthage）建成宫殿及巨港（世界奇观）

TEXT.English: Acquire 9000 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前通过劫掠、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得9000金币

TEXT.English: We have accomplished our second Historical Goal. A Golden Age has begun for our civilization!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们已经完成了3个历史目标中的2个，一段属于我们文明的黄金时代就此开启。

TEXT.English: Acquire 3000 gold by selling resources by 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年前通过交易资源获得3000金币

TEXT.English: Create three great generals by 1940 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1940年前产生3位大军事家

TEXT.English: Have more than 750 Culture in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前850年时(133回合)拥有超过750点文化值

TEXT.English: Convert to Orthodoxy five turns after its foundation and have three settled Great Prophets and an Orthodox Cathedral by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在东正教创立后5个回合内皈依东正教，并且公元1200年前在本文明城市入驻3位大预言家，建成1座东正教大教堂。
入驻世俗主义文明城市的大政治家：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most culturally advanced city in the world in 700 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前700年时（288回合）使巴比伦成为世界上文化值最高的城市

TEXT.English: Artha: Experience 36 turns of golden age
TEXT.Chinese: 富足：经历36回合黄金时代
秘鲁地区无外国殖民地
公元400年前获得3处熏香资源

TEXT.English: Civilization with the most culture producing buildings in their Capital: %s1
TEXT.Chinese: 首都拥有全球最多文化建筑的文明: %s1

TEXT.English: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 25 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有全球最高的支持率累计达到25回合
公元200年时（154回合）积累5000金币

TEXT.English: Have more than 150000 culture in 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年时至少拥有150000点文化值

TEXT.English: Continuous empire from the Barents Sea to the Mediterranean Sea
TEXT.Chinese: 从巴伦支海到地中海的连续帝国
处于和平状态的回合数：%d1 / %d2
斯卡格拉克和卡特加特
公元1400年时控制7处大使馆
公元1980年前建成1枚洲际弹道导弹

TEXT.English: Civilization with the largest Jewish Population: %s1
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有最多犹太教人口的文明：%s1

TEXT.English: Build a Buddhist Chaitya and a Confucian Guozijian by 1200 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1200年前建成一座佛寺和一座学宫

TEXT.English: Make Tenochtitlan the largest city in the world in 1520 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 确保特诺奇蒂特兰（Tenochtitlan）在公元1520年时是全球人口最多的城市
已控制非宗教奇观数量：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: All the World Under One Roof
Be the first to discover ten Industrial technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 率先研发10个工业时代科技

TEXT.English: Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（134回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚

TEXT.English: Have an average city culture of 9000 by 1600 AD without ever losing a city
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1600年前，在从未失去过任何城市的前提下，城市平均文化值达到9000点

TEXT.English: Control a continuous empire from a port on the Barents Sea to a port on the Mediterranean Sea
TEXT.Chinese: 控制一个从巴伦支海沿岸港口到地中海沿岸港口的领土连续帝国

TEXT.English: Build 6 Castras, 5 Aqueducts, 4 Arenas and 3 Forums by 100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元100年前建成6座罗马兵营、5座引水渠、4座竞技场和3座中心广场

TEXT.English: Build La Mezquita and settle a total of four great prophets, scientists or engineers in Cordoba by 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1300年前在科尔多瓦建成科尔多瓦清真寺并在城中入驻4名大预言家、大科学家或大工程师

TEXT.English: Conquer 4 cities from civs that have declared war on you
TEXT.Chinese: 占领4个向你宣战的文明的城市
公元1300年时控制中国全境

TEXT.English: Build the University of Sankore and settle a great prophet in its city by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前建成桑科雷大学并在所在城市入驻1名大预言家
圣火：将祆教传播到全球10%的城市

TEXT.English: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 慈：拥有全球最高的民众预期寿命累计达到150回合

TEXT.English: Found a city in Australia by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前在澳大利亚建立一座城市

TEXT.English: Make sure there are 15 pagan temples in the world
TEXT.Chinese: 确保全球存在至少15座原始神庙

TEXT.English: Artha: Experience 72 turns of golden age
TEXT.Chinese: 富足：经历72回合黄金时代

TEXT.English: Control 7% of the world by 140 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元140年前控制全球7%的陆地
全球商业产出最多的城市：%s1_city

TEXT.English: Great Prophets, Scientists and Statesmen in Jewish cities: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太教城市中入驻的大预言家、大科学家和大政治家：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Humility: Have legendary culture in the Taoist holy city
TEXT.Chinese: 不敢为天下先：确保道教圣城文化等级达到辉煌永恒

TEXT.English: Control 75% of the world's commerce and military power between you, your vassals and allies by 1990 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1990年前确保本国与附庸国、盟国控制全球75%以上的商业产出以及75%以上的军事力量
通往大西洋港口的铁路
公元1200年时积累24000点文化值
大预言家、大科学家和大艺术家：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Control 2 holy city shrines in 350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年（164回合）时控制2座宗教圣殿

TEXT.English: Have five units of level five
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有5个晋升等级为五级的单位

TEXT.English: Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 100 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 慈：拥有全球最高的民众预期寿命累计达到100回合
已控制加拿大区域领土比例：%s1 / %s2%%

TEXT.English: Build the Red Fort, Shalimar Gardens and the Taj Mahal by 1660 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1660年前建成红堡、沙利玛花园和泰姬陵

TEXT.English: Build the Shwedagon Paya, 2 Buddhist Temples, and 2 Buddhist Monasteries by 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年前建成瑞金大金塔、2座佛堂和2座佛院

TEXT.English: Gain 1500 gold through slave trade by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年前通过奴隶贸易获得1500金币

TEXT.English: Control 15 colonies in Brazil, Africa and Asia in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年时在巴西、非洲和亚洲控制15处殖民地

TEXT.English: Holy See: Be Pope for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 圣座：成为教皇累计150回合

TEXT.English: Control 8 Slave Plantations and 4 Pastures in 1880 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1880年时控制8座奴隶种植园以及4座牧场

TEXT.English: Build 6 Castras, 5 Aqueducts, 4 Arenas and 3 Forums by 100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元100年前(147回合)建成6座罗马兵营、5座引水渠、4座竞技场和3座中心广场
已控制北美洲区域领土比例：%s1 / %s2%%

TEXT.English: Do not allow any Persian or Turkic nation to conquer a city in the Arabian Peninsula prior to the Collapse of the Ottomans
TEXT.Chinese: 确保任何波斯或突厥区域文明（蒙古、突厥、波斯、可萨、奥斯曼）在奥斯曼崩溃前均无法在阿拉伯半岛征服任何一座城市

TEXT.English: Control a total of 25 frigates or man-o-wars and sink 50 enemy ships by 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年前拥有总计25艘三桅战舰或皇家海军主力战舰，同时累计击沉50艘敌舰

TEXT.English: Acquire 2000 gold by selling resources by 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年前通过交易资源获得2000金币

TEXT.English: Have three cities of at least size 12 by 1400 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1400年前拥有三座人口规模超过12的城市
控制全球科研产出最高的城市回合数: %d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Monopolize Gold, Silver, Gems and Ivory in Sub-Saharan Africa in 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年时垄断撒哈拉以南非洲的所有黄金、白银、宝石和象牙资源

TEXT.English: Iconography: Make sure the five most cultured cities in the world are Orthodox
TEXT.Chinese: 圣像崇拜：确保世界上文化值最高的5座城市均为东正教城市

TEXT.English: Varna: Settle five different great people in the Hindu holy city
TEXT.Chinese: 种姓：在印度教圣城中入驻5名不同类型的伟人

TEXT.English: Control 7% of the world by 140 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元140年前控制全球7%的陆地
公元1450年前积累24000点文化值

TEXT.English: Have a city of at least 30000 culture in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年时拥有一座超过30000点文化值的城市

TEXT.English: Control 20 unimproved forest or marsh tiles
TEXT.Chinese: 控制20块未开发的森林或沼泽地块

TEXT.English: Settle 3 great merchants in Amsterdam by 1745 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1745年前在阿姆斯特丹入驻3名大商人

TEXT.English: Make Babylon the most populous city in the world in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前850年时（258回合）使巴比伦成为世界上人口最多的城市

TEXT.English: Control Saint Peter's Basilica in 1000 AD, the Church of the Anastasis in 1200 AD and All Saint's Church in 1550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年时控制圣彼得大教堂，公元1200年时控制阿纳斯塔西教堂，公元1550年时控制诸圣大教堂

TEXT.English: Holy See: Be Pope for 300 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 圣座：成为教皇累计300回合
公元350年（498回合）前控制7座世界奇观

TEXT.English: Tolerance: Control the Cathedrals of all religions
TEXT.Chinese: 宗教宽容：控制全世界所有宗教的大教堂

TEXT.English: First to enter the Modern Era
TEXT.Chinese: 率先进入信息时代（存疑）

TEXT.English: Have more wonders in your capital than any other city in the world
TEXT.Chinese: 本国首都拥有比全球任何其他城市更多的世界奇观

TEXT.English: Have the highest commerce output among Islamic civilizations and make sure there are a palace, an Islamic Mosque, a Orthodox Cathedral and a Jewish Sanhedrin in Sennar in 1821 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在1821年时，拥有伊斯兰文明中最高的商业产出，同时确保森纳尔（Sennar）建有1座宫殿，1座伊斯兰清真寺，1座东正教大教堂以及1座犹太教会堂

TEXT.English: Win and attend the congress for two world wars
TEXT.Chinese: 赢得2次世界大战，并出席战后国际会议

TEXT.English: Great prophets, scientists and engineers in %s1_city: %d2 / %d3
TEXT.Chinese: 入驻%s1_city的大预言家、大科学家和大工程师：%d2 / %d3

TEXT.English: Have legendary culture in Buenos Aires by 1960 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1960年前确保布宜诺斯艾利斯文化等级达到辉煌永恒
俘获20个旧大陆文明单位

TEXT.English: Have an average city culture of 6000 by 1600 AD without ever losing a city
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1600年前，在从未失去过任何城市的前提下，城市平均文化值达到6000点

TEXT.English: Railroad from Moscow to a Siberian port
TEXT.Chinese: 西伯利亚大铁路（从莫斯科到西伯利亚港口）

TEXT.English: Turns with highest life expectancy rating: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有全球最高的民众预期寿命回合数：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Moderation: Control the Confucian and Taoist shrines and combine their income to 40 gold
TEXT.Chinese: 俭：控制儒学和道教圣殿，并确保每回合圣殿金币收入达到40金币

TEXT.English: Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 涅槃：拥有全球最高的支持率累计达到150回合

TEXT.English: Settle 5 great prophets in Lhasa by 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1700年在拉萨入驻5位大预言家

TEXT.English: Control Italy, France, Scandinavia, England and Russia in 1940 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1940年时控制意大利、法兰西、斯堪的纳维亚、英格兰和俄罗斯地区
儒学、道教圣殿收入之和：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Build the Pyramids in Kerma by 656 BC and Control Egypt for 1000 years
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前656年前在克尔玛（Kerma，即努比亚文明出生点）建成大金字塔，并控制埃及地区1000年以上

TEXT.English: Currently no European colonies in Subequatorial Africa
TEXT.Chinese: 目前在赤道以南非洲地区无欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: City with the highest trade income: %s1_city
Acquire 3000 gold through piracy by 1650 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1650年前通过海上掠夺获得3000金币

TEXT.English: Have more than 1500 Culture in 850 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前850年时(258回合)拥有超过750点文化值
定居在新教国家城市的大工程师：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Control all tiles in Mesoamerica in 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年时控制中美洲的所有地块

TEXT.English: Acquire 3000 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships by 1500 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年前通过劫掠、占领城市和击沉敌舰获得3000金币

TEXT.English: Control Italy and Iberia in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（408回合）时控制意大利和伊比利亚
每座城市平均商业产出最高的文明：%s1

TEXT.English: Control Egypt, the Maghreb, Spain, Mesopotamia and Persia directly or by vassal in 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1300年时直接控制埃及、马格里布、西班牙、美索不达米亚和波斯，或纳为附庸

TEXT.English: Build 6 Castras, 5 Aqueducts, 4 Arenas and 3 Forums by 100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元100年前(448回合)建成6座罗马兵营、5座引水渠、4座竞技场和3座中心广场

TEXT.English: Currently no European colonies in East and Subequatorial Africa
TEXT.Chinese: 目前在东非及赤道以南非洲地区无欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Control Australia, New Zealand, New Guinea and 3 Pacific islands in 1950 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1950年时控制澳大利亚、新西兰、新几内亚和3个太平洋岛屿
公元200年时（468回合）积累15000金币

TEXT.English: Control a continuous empire from the Danube River to Lake Zaysan in 1241 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1241年时控制一个从多瑙河到斋桑湖的连续帝国

TEXT.English: Check the Victory Conditions (F8) for details
TEXT.Chinese: 查看胜利条件界面(F8)了解详情
外交关系亲密的拥有%s1人口文明：%d2 / %d3

TEXT.English: Control 2 holy city shrines in 350 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 在公元350年时控制2座宗教圣殿
已控制欧洲区域领土比例：%s1 / %s2%%

TEXT.English: Control the shrines of Hinduism and Buddhism in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（408回合）时控制印度教和佛教的圣殿

TEXT.English: Build three cathedrals of your state religion by 1880 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1880年前建成3座官方宗教的大教堂

TEXT.English: No foreign colonies in South Asia
TEXT.Chinese: 南亚没有非南亚文明的殖民地

TEXT.English: Control more culture producing buildings in your capital than any other nation in 1229
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1229年时本国首都拥有比任何其他国家首都更多的文化建筑

TEXT.English: Have an average city size of 12 or more in 1450 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1450年时本国城市的平均人口等级达到12或以上

TEXT.English: Great prophets settled in the Sankore city: %d1 / %d2
TEXT.Chinese: 桑科雷大学所在城市中入驻的大预言家：%d1 / %d2
公元200年（181回合）前研发历法

TEXT.English: Control 65% of the Mediterranean by 1930 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1930年前控制地中海沿岸陆地的65%

TEXT.English: Humanism: Make sure there are 25 Universities, 10 Great Scientists and 10 Great Statesmen in secular civilizations
TEXT.Chinese: 人文主义：确保世俗主义文明城市中有至少25座大学，入驻至少10名大科学家和10名大政治家

TEXT.English: Control 7% of the world by 140 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元140年前控制全球7%的陆地

TEXT.English: No European colonies in Central America, Southern USA and the Caribbean
TEXT.Chinese: 中美洲、美国南部和加勒比地区没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Be the most advanced civilization in 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1300年时成为全球最先进的文明

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover eight Industrial and eight Global era technologies
TEXT.Chinese: 率先发现8项工业时代科技和8项全球化时代科技

TEXT.English: Control the shrines of Hinduism and Buddhism in 100 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前100年（134回合）时控制印度教和佛教的圣殿
至少将7座城市夷为平地

TEXT.English: End twelve wars through diplomacy by 2000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元2000年前通过外交手段结束12次战争

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize 40% of Europe and North America in 1800 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1800年时控制欧洲及北美洲各40%的陆地，或纳为附庸

TEXT.English: Promised Land: Have legendary culture in the Jewish holy city
TEXT.Chinese: 应许之地：确保犹太教圣城文化等级达到辉煌永恒

TEXT.English: Sell 5 Slaves and buy 5 Strategic Resources by 1380
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1380年前，出售5个奴隶，并购买5个战略资源
作为附庸国的欧洲天主教国家：%d1 / %d2
公元1200年时积累8000点文化值
控制中美洲地块百分比：%s1 / %s2%%

TEXT.English: Control or vassalize Korea, Manchuria, China, Indochina, Indonesia and Philippines in 1940 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1940年时控制或附庸朝鲜、中国东北、中国中原地区、中南半岛、印度尼西亚和菲律宾

TEXT.English: Loyalty: Control an army of 200 non-obsolete melee or gunpowder units
TEXT.Chinese: 忠：控制至少200个未过时的肉搏或火器单位

TEXT.English: Control Mesopotamia, Transoxania and Northwestern India in 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年时控制美索不达米亚、中亚河中地区和印度西北部
西伯利亚地区的城市数量：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Acquire 3000 gold by selling resources by 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年前通过交易资源获得3000金币

TEXT.English: Build three Reservoirs, two Granaries and two Smokehouses by 1500 BC
TEXT.Chinese: 公元前1500年前建造3座蓄水池，2座粮仓和2座熏肉房
大哥伦比亚地区无外国殖民地
穆罕默德·伊本·图格鲁克

TEXT.English: Sila: Be at peace for 150 turns
TEXT.Chinese: 戒律：保持和平状态至少150回合

TEXT.English: Have more than 75000 culture in 1750 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1750年时至少拥有75000点文化值

TEXT.English: Build four castles and kraals and Great Zimbabwe and control them in 1400 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1400年时建成并控制4座城堡、4座牧场以及大津巴布韦
世俗主义文明城市中的大学数量：%d1 / %d2

TEXT.English: Be the first to discover Construction, Arithmetics, Writing, Calendar and Contract
TEXT.Chinese: 率先发现建筑学、算术、文字、历法和契约精神

TEXT.English: Have more than 1500 culture in 550 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元550年时积累至少1500点文化值

TEXT.English: Acquire eight ivory resources and six gem resources
TEXT.Chinese: 获得8处象牙资源以及6处宝石资源

TEXT.English: Have 22500 gold in 1500 AD and 45000 gold in 1700 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1500年时拥有22500金币，并在公元1700年时拥有45000金币
人均商业产出最高的城市：%s1
公元200年（278回合）前研发历法

TEXT.English: Allow no European colonies in Peru, Gran Colombia, the Guayanas and the Caribbean in 1870 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1870年时确保秘鲁、大哥伦比亚、圭亚那和加勒比地区没有欧洲殖民地

TEXT.English: Have the largest population in the world in 1300 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1300年时拥有全球最多的人口
